text: You Don't Mess with the Zohan (also known as just Zohan) is a 2008 American slapstick comedy movie. It was produced by Adam Sandler, Jack Giarraputo, and Robert Smigel. The movie was written by Adam Sandler, Robert Smigel, and Judd Apatow and was directed by Dennis Dugan. The movie was released on June 6, 2008 in North America. The movie gained mixed reviews from critics and holds a 37% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. == Cast == * Adam Sandler as Zohan Dvir/Scrappy Coco * Emmanuelle Chriqui as Dalia Hakbarah * Rob Schneider as Salim the taxi driver * John Turturro as Fatoush "Phantom" Hakbarah * Nick Swardson as Michael Klayman * Lainie Kazan as Gail Klayman * Ido Mosseri as Oori * Daoud Heidami as Nasi * John Paul DeJoria as Paul Mitchell * Michael Buffer as Grant Walbridge * Dave Matthews as James T. O'Skanlon * Shelley Berman as Mr. Dvir * Dina Doronne as Mrs. Dvir * Kevin Nealon as community watch member * Robert Smigel as Yosi * Sayed Badreya as Haleem * Ahmed Ahmed as Waleed * Alec Mapa as Claude * Chris Rock as Caribbean taxi driver ==References== == Other websites == *Official website * Category:2008 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies produced by Adam Sandler Category:Movies set in Israel Category:Movies set in Asia Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Screenplays by Adam Sandler Category:Happy Madison movies Category:Movies directed by Dennis Dugan
title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
